ygData.subject: Re: About New Rules
ygData.msgSnippet: It means you d have to post for almost every char every two days (I d spread it out over the two days if I were you, though, as to avoid giant posts). However,

It means you'd have to post for almost every char every two days (I'd 
spread it out over the two days if I were you, though, as to avoid 
giant posts). However, you still can't have more than 7 per faction.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Okie If I didn't mis understand if I like control more than 16 
> characters I  have to post with them every single day, am I right?
> 
> Other thing: I just can use RPG once time by day, specially Sunday, 
> can I  have troubles due that???
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:

computer

the

> > > > five

The 
> char
> > > > > > regulations apply on the 12th (so you guys have 6 days to 
> kill
> > > > off any
> > > > > > additional chars you have). The other rules come in 
effect 
> NOW.
> > > > > > Everyone, go read the rules! We'll be hunting down and 
> punishing
> > > > > > violators like crazy, so be sure to follow them :-)
> > > > > >
> > > > > > All you peeps who were complainin' about the char limit, 
we 
> made
> > > a
> > > > > > slight exception for you, though it's hard work. Anyways,

> > > it
> > > > > > out, read carefully, and obey.
> > > > > >
> > > > > >

chars,

> > > > > > is a good opportunity to get a few of them killed.
